text: Ratha han mi inkhat kôm sin kamâmom thotheina a pêka; adang kôm, Pathien chongbê misîr theina a pêka; male midang inkhat kôm Ratha adik le dikloi riet sensâi theina a pêka. Midang inkhat kôm rietloi chonga thurchi misîr theina a pêka, male midang kôm rietloi chong rilminthâr theina a pêk ani.
